Generation V.Black: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.
Generation V.White: Revived from a fossil, this Pokémon is thought to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon.
Generation V.Black 2: It was revived from an ancient fossil. Not able to fly, it lived in treetops and hopped from one branch to another.
Generation V.White 2: It was revived from an ancient fossil. Not able to fly, it lived in treetops and hopped from one branch to another.

Generation VI.X: Revived from a fossil, this Pokémon is thought to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon.
Generation VI.Y: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Revived from a fossil, this Pokémon is thought to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.

Generation VII.Sun: It is the ancestor of all bird Pokémon. Archen itself could not actually fly but moved by hopping from treetop to treetop.
Generation VII.Moon: To all appearances flightless, it was able to glide down from tall treetops to snag its prey.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Once thought to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon, some of the latest research suggests that may not be the case.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Restored from a fossil, this ancient bird Pokémon has wings but can't yet fly.

Generation VIII.Sword: This Pokémon was successfully restored from a fossil. As research suggested, Archen is unable to fly. But it's very good at jumping.
Generation VIII.Shield: Archen is said to be the ancestor of bird Pokémon. It lived in treetops, eating berries and bug Pokémon.

Generation V.Black: Revive from Plume Fossil at the Nacrene Museum
Generation V.White: Revive from Plume Fossil at the Nacrene Museum
Generation V.Black 2: Revive from Plume Fossil at the Nacrene Museum
Generation V.White 2: Revive from Plume Fossil at the Nacrene Museum

Generation VI.X: Revive from Plume Fossil at the Ambrette Town Fossil Lab
Generation VI.Y: Revive from Plume Fossil at the Ambrette Town Fossil Lab
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Revive from Plume Fossil at the Devon Corporation in Rustboro City
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Trade Receive Plume Fossil held by a traded Pokémon and revive it

Generation VII.Sun: Trade Receive Plume Fossil held by a traded Pokémon and revive it
Generation VII.Moon: Revive from Plume Fossil at the Fossil Restoration Center on Route 8
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Revive from Plume Fossil at the Fossil Restoration Center on Route 8
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Revive from Plume Fossil at the Fossil Restoration Center on Route 8
